alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:28PM CDT until May 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WILLIAMSON AND NORTHEASTERN BURNET COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Joppa, or near Bertram, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Burnet, Bertram, Florence, Mahomet, Joppa, Andice, Sun City, Shady Grove and Briggs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for south central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
